Benchmarking chk

Source: vignettes/benchmarking-chk.Rmd
benchmarking-chk.Rmd
library(chk)
library(microbenchmark)

fun_checking <- function(x, ...) {
  chk_flag(x)
  chk_unused(...)  
  x
}

fun_conditional_checking <- function(x, ...) {
  if(is_chk_on()) {
    chk_flag(x)
    chk_unused(...)
  }
  x
}

wrapper_on_fun_checking <- function(x) {
  fun_checking(x)
}

wrapper_on_fun_conditional_checking <- function(x) {
  if(is_chk_on()) {
    chk_off()
    on.exit(chk_on())
  }
  fun_conditional_checking(x)
}

chk_on()
microbenchmark(
  wrapper_on_fun_checking(TRUE),
  wrapper_on_fun_conditional_checking(TRUE)
)
#> Unit: microseconds
#>                                       expr   min     lq      mean median
#>              wrapper_on_fun_checking(TRUE) 1.404 1.4800 151.89363 1.5675
#>  wrapper_on_fun_conditional_checking(TRUE) 3.762 3.9165  38.96162 4.0170
#>      uq       max neval
#>  1.6605 14873.705   100
#>  4.1525  3427.136   100

chk_off()
microbenchmark(
  wrapper_on_fun_checking(TRUE),
  wrapper_on_fun_conditional_checking(TRUE)
)
#> Unit: microseconds
#>                                       expr   min     lq    mean median
#>              wrapper_on_fun_checking(TRUE) 1.265 1.3030 1.44699 1.3435
#>  wrapper_on_fun_conditional_checking(TRUE) 1.687 1.7295 1.87354 1.8150
#>     uq   max neval
#>  1.380 7.188   100
#>  1.877 7.311   100
